def_cn: （眼下无法接受时）推迟接受邀请，延期接受邀请
def_en: If you say you will take a rain check on an offer or suggestion, you mean that you do not want to accept it now, but you might accept it at another time.

def_cn: （比赛等因恶劣天气改期时）可以再次使用的票据
def_en: A rain check is a free ticket that is given to people when an outdoor game or event is stopped because of rain or bad weather, so that they can go to it when it is held again.
